about_the_game:
Overview

This is the DLC for the game Beyond Shadowgate!

It includes:

Retro Strategy Guide{/b]
Did you love the old Nintendo Strategy Guides? Yes? If so, you'll love our 60 page Beyond Shadowgate guide! It features step-by-step instructions that will take you through the entire game! It also features a ton of information about the game, behind the scenes info and maps!

Original Soundtrack
Orie Falconer pays homage to the great Hiroyuki Masuno, the composer of the original Shadowgate NES score! Orie has created 22 compelling chip-tune tracks for your listening pleasure!

Prelude Beyond Shadowgate comic
Want to find out what brought our hero Del Thornburrow to the dungeons of Gwynenthell, the capital city of Kal Torlin? Well, you're in luck! This digital comic will take you on a wild journey that ultimately leads to the start of the Beyond Shadowgate game!

NES Shadowgate comic
We created this comic to support NES Shadowgate many moons ago! Go down memory lane with this digital retelling of the classic adventure!

Raven Comic
The heroine of the shelved Shadowgate Rising N64 game was given the comic treatment and never released! Enjoy this story of Raven and her sarcastic pal Yorick!

8-bit map of the World of Shadowgate
It wouldn't be a Shadowgate game without a map! This 8-bit map created by our game artist Jeff Canam will look great as a desktop wallpaper!

Info on the game!

Here's some info on the game that the DLC contents are based on...

The original design of the never-before seen point and click adventure is being brought to life after 30+ years in the vault - Beyond Shadowgate! This new PC game is being created by the designers of the original 8-bit hit Shadowgate and a leading 8-bit adventure studio!

With a world that is over five times larger than Shadowgate, Beyond Shadowgate captures the same look and feel as the 8-bit console version while including modern design sensibilities. Since the memory and color palette limitations are removed, Beyond Shadowgate is a much longer and vibrant game, with both retro and modern gameplay mechanics that give you the feel of the original! For players accustomed to the NES 8-bit version, the game features XInput controller support. The adventure is also completely playable by mouse and key binds.

Get ready for the ultimate, official Shadowgate sequel!

Story

35 years have passed since Jair defeated the Warlock Lord in the caverns beneath the living castle, Shadowgate. In that time, the land of Kal Torlin prospered and the events of Shadowgate were forgotten. But once again evil is stirring, scheming to bring the world to ruin.

In the dungeons of Gwynenthell, the capital city of Kal Torlin, a lowly Fenling by the name of Del Thornburrow awaits his fate. No stranger to a jail cell, Del soon frees himself from the dangers of the dungeon, only to begin a journey that will push him to the edge of his limits.

Lead Del as he travels through Gwynenthell, across the Torlin Forest, over the Gatekeeper Mountains, and beyond! Uncover plots to overthrow kingdoms that threaten to plunge the land into darkness! Interact with old friends and new, while protecting Del from the traps, hazards, monsters, and every other peril that may introduce him to the ever-present Grim Reaper.

Features

By the Numbers…

  • 250+ Rooms of adventure!
  • 180+ Different ways to die!
  • 150+ Objects in which to interact!
  • 100+ Puzzles to solve!
  • 20+ NPCs inhabit the lands!
  • 3+ Game Endings to experience!

Also featuring…

  • A Side Quest based on Déjà vu: A Nightmare Comes True!
  • A Side Quest based on The Uninvited!
  • A Side Quest based on Shadowgate VR: The Mines of Mythrok!
  • Controller & mouse and keyboard!
  • A brand new Hint System!
  • A Quick Travel Map!
  • Lethal Puzzle Events!
  • Day/Night Progression!
  • A Death Indicator!

short_description: The DLC for the game Beyond Shadowgate includes 60 page retro, Strategy Guide, Original Soundtrack (22 tunes), Prelude Beyond Shadowgate comic, and an 8-bit map of the World of Shadowgate! Note that this purchase is for the DLC only and not the game itself.
